Who.Description: VOEvent created with voevent-parse, version 1.0.3. See https://github.com/timstaley/voevent-parse for details.

Param.name: Event_ID
Param.Description: Name event, given by external observatory

Param.name: Trigger_ID
Param.Description: Trigger ID, given by external observatory

Param.name: Pkt_ser_num
Param.Description: Packet serial number since beginning, increase by 1 for every revision received

Param.name: Instruments
Param.Description: Instruments which originated of the alert

Param.name: LongShort
Param.Description: Long-short classification, given by external observatory

Param.name: Hratio
Param.Description: Hardness ratio classification, given by external observatory

Param.name: Sun_distance
Param.Description: Sun distance from space, given by external observatory

Param.name: Moon_distance
Param.Description: Moon distance from space, given by external observatory

Param.name: Moon_illum
Param.Description: Moon illumination from space, given by external observatory

Param.name: Loc_url
Param.Description: URL to retrieve location of the healpix skymap

Param.name: Name_tel
Param.Description: Name of the telescope used for the observation strategy

Field.name: Field_id
Field.Description: ID of the field of FOV

Field.name: RA
Field.Description: The right ascension at center of fov in equatorial coordinates

Field.name: Dec
Field.Description: The declination at center of fov in equatorial coordinates

Field.name: Os_score
Field.Description: Gives the importance of the tile/galaxy to observe
